channel.title: Compile
channel.description:
hey guys this will take about 1sec for you to help me. I just need a compiler code becusae my compiler dosn't work. just post a 317 compiler code and that would be great.!
thank you :cool:

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“DarienM, post:8, topic:354534”]like is it mycomputer>programfiles>java

or somewhere else, because the code will be wrong, so make sure its in my computer, program files, java. Also make sure *.java is in your java folder

@echo off
title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause[/quote]

He must put the compiler in the same folder as the .java files for the files to be compiled.

Read full topic

use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You have to change the 21 to your JDK version.

Hit “My Computer”, “Program Files”, “Java”, you should see jdk1.6.0_## the ## is your jdk version change the 21 in your compiler to your jdk version number.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @bluefire7913 bluefire7913
item.description:
@bluefire7913 wrote:

@echo off
title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

My code and i have a 32bit comp. But when i compiled it didn’t work. it said
The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . . but i tested my java and its running /on/ but i still can’t compile stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Look above there’s a topic made for this.

This is for a 32 bit OS, you must have a 32 bit Java.

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java

This is for a 64 bit OS. You must download a 32 bit Java.

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java

To make it work with your JDK, you must change the 21, to what ever version of Java you have.

Read full topic
